attributes.action: Give parents a choice on whether to send their kids to school..
attributes.additional_details: Myself and my husband both have serious underlying health conditions, and if are children were to catch Covid 19 in school, we both would be really ill, and are children would struggle more with both parents be poorly than not being in school,
attributes.background: Give parents a choice to send their children to school, when both parents have serious underlying health conditions that could make both parents really unwell if their children was to catch covid 19,

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549629
